summary: Neo-nazi takes over a school, turns it into training camp with attempt to coup d'etat. Sukeban Deka should stop him, but it seems to impossible if she's alone.
cast: Yui Asaka|Masatô Ibu|Keizô Kanie|Gorô Kataoka|Ayako Kobayashi|Yôko Minamino|Katsumi Muramatsu|Hiroyuki Nagato|Taketoshi Naitô|Yuma Nakamura|Yuka Ohnishi|Haruko Sagara|Shinobu Sakagami|Tetta Sugimoto|Yayoi Tanaka|Shinji Wada|Akie Yoshizawa|Michiko Makino
keywords: seifuku|japanese schoolgirl|japanese school girl|japanese high school girl|almond eyes
title: Sukeban deka
